evidence_in_dialogue: [[Robbins]] officer clay was killed by a single close-range shotgun blast to the back of the head... suspect clyde tremmel
[[Brass]] we matched your prints from a stolen car off the prints from a prior car theft, and bingo, we had a match
[[Warrick]] i got this off the jacket from your apartment... it's a bullet wipe
[[Nick]] ran the criminal records for the employees... came up with a raul valdez
